file_insights.changes_summary: Added pulse animation and hover effects to StatusBadge component
key_modifications: Imported animation utilities (keyframeAnimations, createTransition, duration, easing, createAnimation)
Created activeStatuses array to identify statuses requiring pulse animation
Added hover scale transform (1.05) with smooth transition on StyledChip
Implemented conditional pulse animation for active/ongoing status types
Applied animation to both chip container and icon elements

patterns_discovered.description: Used activeStatuses array to determine which status types should have pulse animation, enabling selective animation based on status state
patterns_discovered.relevance: Allows intelligent animation triggering without hardcoding animation logic into each status type

patterns_discovered.description: Leveraged centralized animation utilities (keyframeAnimations, createTransition, etc.) from shared utils/animations module
patterns_discovered.relevance: Ensures consistent animation behavior across components and maintains single source of truth for animation parameters

patterns_discovered.description: Applied pulse animation to both parent chip element and child icon element simultaneously
patterns_discovered.relevance: Creates cohesive visual effect where all interactive elements animate in sync

patterns_discovered.description: Combined hover effects (scale transform) with ongoing animation (pulse) for layered interactivity
patterns_discovered.relevance: Provides visual feedback for both user interaction and component state without conflicting animations

gotchas_discovered.description: Pulse animation uses 2000ms duration with easeInOut easing, but hover transition uses fast duration with standard easing. Different timing characteristics could cause visual awkwardness when hovering during animation.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure animation timing is validated during QA; consider using consistent easing functions across all interactions

gotchas_discovered.description: Icon receives the same pulse animation as the parent chip, which could cause performance overhead if chip has multiple nested animated elements
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Monitor performance with browser DevTools; consider using CSS animation-delay to create cascade effect instead of identical timing

gotchas_discovered.description: activeStatuses array is hardcoded in component; if new status types are added to StatusType enum, they won't automatically receive pulse animation
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Document relationship between statusConfig and activeStatuses; consider refactoring to embed animation flag directly in status configuration object

approach_outcome.implementation_approach: Enhanced StatusBadge component with motion design by integrating centralized animation utilities and applying conditional animations based on status type classification
key_accomplishments: Implemented pulse animation for active/ongoing status states
Added smooth scale hover effect with proper transition timing
Maintained component API compatibility without breaking changes
Leveraged existing animation utility system for consistency
approach_outcome.technical_quality: Good - Clean implementation using established patterns; animation utilities properly imported and applied

recommendations.recommendation: Refactor status configuration to embed animation properties within statusConfig object instead of maintaining separate activeStatuses array
recommendations.rationale: Reduces duplication and ensures animation behavior stays synchronized with status definitions

recommendations.recommendation: Add will-change CSS property to animated elements to optimize paint cycles
recommendations.rationale: Improves animation performance for active status badges, especially in lists with multiple animated items

recommendations.recommendation: Add visual regression tests to verify pulse and hover animations work correctly across all active status types
recommendations.rationale: Ensures animation behavior remains consistent during future refactoring

recommendations.recommendation: Document which status types trigger animations and why in code comments or component documentation
recommendations.rationale: Helps future developers understand the animation logic and maintain the status-animation mapping
